message:
<system-reminder>
🌿 BRANCH CREATED - NEXT:
🌿 BRANCH CREATED: Create tasks for this branch's work
🤖 ASSIGN: Consider assigning specialized agents
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
📋 TASK CREATED - NEXT STEPS:
✅ NEXT STEP: Delegate to agent using Task tool with task_id only
💡 SUGGESTION: Create subtasks for better tracking
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
📌 SUBTASK CREATED - TIPS:
💡 INFO: Subtask inherited parent's assignees
📊 TIP: Use progress_percentage in updates for auto status
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
📌 SUBTASK CREATED - TIPS:
📊 TIP: Use progress_percentage in updates for auto status
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
📋 TASK CREATED - NEXT STEPS:
✅ NEXT STEP: Delegate to agent using Task tool with task_id only
💡 SUGGESTION: Create subtasks for better tracking
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
📋 TASK CREATED - NEXT STEPS:
✅ NEXT STEP: Delegate to agent using Task tool with task_id only
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
📊 TASK UPDATED - REMINDERS:
⏰ REMINDER: Continue updating every 25% progress
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
💡 GET COMPLETE - REMINDERS:
📋 REVIEW: Check task status and plan next actions
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
💡 LIST COMPLETE - REMINDERS:
📋 REVIEW: Check task status and plan next actions
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
✅ TASK COMPLETED - FOLLOW-UP:
💾 NEXT: Update context with learnings from this task
🎯 CONTINUE: Use 'next' action to find next task to work on
</system-reminder>
